Tesla Announces Date for Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2018 Financial Results and Webcast | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back Tesla Announces Date for Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2018 Financial Results and Webcast Globe Newswire Jan 18, 2019 PALO ALTO, Calif., Jan. 18, 2019 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Tesla will post its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31st, 2018 after market close on Wednesday, January 30th, 2019.&nbsp; At that time, Tesla will issue a brief advisory containing a link to the Q4 and full year 2018 Update Letter, which will be available on Tesla’s Investor Relations website.&nbsp; Tesla management will hold a live question and answer webcast that day at 2:30pm Pacific Time (5:30pm Eastern Time) to discuss the Company’s financial and business results and outlook. What: Date of Tesla Q4 and full year 2018 Financial Results and Q&amp;A Webcast When: Wednesday, January 30th, 2019 Time: 2:30pm Pacific Time / 5:30pm Eastern Time Shareholder Letter:&nbsp; &nbsp; http://ir.tesla.com Webcast: http://ir.tesla.com (live and replay) &nbsp; &nbsp; Approximately two hours after the Q&amp;A session, an archived version of the webcast will be available on the Company’s website. &nbsp; Footer Tesla © 2026 Subscription Preferences Contact &amp; FAQ Privacy &amp; Legal
